Fibonacci sequence

The Fibonacci sequence is defined through the recurrence relation Fn=Fn−1+Fn−2F_{n} = F_{n - 1} + F_{n - 2}. It can also be expressed in closed form:

Fn=⌊15ϕn⌉,ϕ=1+52F_{n} = \left\lfloor {\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}}\phi^{n}} \right\rceil,\quad\phi = \frac{1 + \sqrt{5}}{2}

The first 8 numbers of the sequence are:

F1F_{1}

F2F_{2}

F3F_{3}

F4F_{4}

F5F_{5}

F6F_{6}

F7F_{7}

F8F_{8}

1

1

2

3

5

8

13

21

This was already noted by pirates long ago. [dror2009]
